Name: Doha
Description: The capital and largest city of Qatar, known for its modern architecture, shopping malls, and cultural attractions.

Name: Al Rayyan
Description: A region located just west of Doha, known for its educational institutions, sports facilities, and natural parks.

Name: Al Wakrah
Description: A coastal city south of Doha, known for its fishing heritage, beaches, and modern developments.

Name: Al Khor
Description: A city located in the northern part of Qatar, known for its port, rich history, and proximity to the Al Thakira mangroves.

Name: Umm Salal
Description: A municipality located north of Doha, known for its archaeological sites and suburban residential developments.

Name: Al Daayen
Description: A region in the northeastern part of Qatar, with a mix of coastal and desert landscapes, and growing urban developments.

Name: Al Shamal
Description: A region located in the northernmost part of Qatar, known for its natural reserves, beaches, and cultural landmarks.
